author: Fextralife
description:
The Outer Worlds 2: Best Perks Guide for the Best Builds
In this Outer Worlds 2 guide, we're going to talk about the best perks in the game. There are 92 perks available in Outer Worlds 2 to select from based on where you allocate your skill points. A lot of perks have requirements for certain skills, or a certain amount of skill points invested in a specific skill. So we'll talk about that as well.
